vulnerable.commit_message:
virstoragetest: testBackingParse: Use VIR_DOMAIN_DEF_FORMAT_SECURE when formatting xml

We want to format even the secure information in tests.

Signed-off-by: Peter Krempa <pkrempa@redhat.com>
Reviewed-by: Erik Skultety <eskultet@redhat.com>
vulnerable.cve_desc: An information disclosure vulnerability was found in libvirt in versions before 6.3.0. HTTP cookies used to access network-based disks were saved in the XML dump of the guest domain. This flaw allows an attacker to access potentially sensitive information in the domain configuration via the `dumpxml` command.
